organisation_name: European Confederation of Institutes of Internal Auditing (ECIIA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Our members are part of the Global Istitute of Internal Auditing representing 140.0000 internal auditors in the world
relevant_communication:
Recent publication Various position papers about best practices in the Banking sector in Europe. 
Position paper about the role of the audit committees in the public sector
goals__remit: The European Confederation of Institutes of Internal Auditing (ECIIA) is the professional representative body of 36 national institutes of internal audit. The mission of ECIIA is to be the consolidated voice for the profession of internal auditing in Europe by dealing with the European Union, its Parliament and Commission and any other appropriate institutions of influence and to represent and develop the internal audit profession and good corporate governance in Europe. The primary objective is to further the development of corporate governance and internal audit through knowledge sharing, key relationships and regulatory environment oversight
